author: entertainment.ie
title: Travel | Hotel Deal of the Week: Brandon House Hotel
text:
Brandon House Hotel, New Ross, Co. Wexford
SPA BREAK: €139pps to €209pps – 2 nights Bed & Breakfast with Dinner on one evening and a one hour spa treatment each.
Choose from one of the following treatments each: Elemis Skin Specific Facial, Full Body Massage, Reflexology, Signature Manicure or Signature Pedicure. Use of the Thermal Suite is also included.
This is a midweek offer, valid to December 6, 2015.
www.brandonhousehotel.ie
